en.start_message: ✨🚀 Welcome to the Premium Bot! 🚀✨ 🎉 Unlock exclusive Telegram Premium features and enjoy an upgraded experience! 🛡️ Ad-free browsing ⚡ Faster downloads 🎭 Exclusive stickers & reactions 💳 Pick your plan and upgrade now!
en.contact_message: 📞💬 Need Help? Contact the Developer! 👨‍💻 Have questions, feedback, or need assistance? Our developer is here to help! 📌 How to Contact: ✉️ Email: qodirjonov0854@gmail.com 💬 Telegram: @mythicalcosmic 🌐 Website: 127.0.0.1:8000 🛠️ We strive to respond as quickly as possible! 🚀
en.premium_warning: ⚠️🚨 You're on your own now... We warned you! The responsibility is yours. 😬 📌 Lost your link? We will NOT resend it. ❌ No refunds, no exceptions. 🔐 Save it somewhere safe!
en.smm_intro: 📢📊 Welcome to Our SMM Services! 🚀 🚀 Supercharge your online presence with our expert Social Media Marketing (SMM) services. 🔥 Boost engagement 📈 Grow your followers 💸 Increase your sales 🎯 Choose from our top-tier packages and start growing today!
en.payment_question: 💰✨ Choose Your Payment Method ✨💰 💳 Secure and fast transactions! 🔹 💳 Click – Instant payment with your card. 🔹 💳 PayMe – Easy and reliable mobile payments. 🛍️ Choose your preferred method and enjoy premium features!
en.wrong_command: ❌🤖 Oops! Unknown command detected. 🔄 Please try again or use /start for assistance.

uz.start_message: ✨🚀 Premium Botga Xush Kelibsiz! 🚀✨ 🎉 Maxsus Telegram Premium imkoniyatlarini oching va yanada yaxshiroq tajribadan bahramand bo‘ling! 🛡️ Reklamasiz foydalanish ⚡ Tezroq yuklab olish 🎭 Eksklyuziv stikerlar & reaksiyalar 💳 Tarifingizni tanlang va hoziroq yangilang!
uz.contact_message: 📞💬 Yordam kerakmi? Dasturchi bilan bog‘laning! 👨‍💻 Savollaringiz bormi, fikr-mulohaza bildirmoqchimisiz yoki yordam kerakmi? Bizning dasturchimiz sizga yordam beradi! 📌 Qanday bog‘lanish mumkin: ✉️ Email: support@example.com 💬 Telegram: @developer_handle 🌐 Veb-sayt: www.example.com 🛠️ Iloji boricha tezroq javob berishga harakat qilamiz! 🚀
uz.premium_warning: ⚠️🚨 Endi hammasi o‘zingizga bog‘liq... Biz sizni ogohlantirdik! Mas’uliyat endi sizda. 😬 📌 Havolani yo‘qotdingizmi? Uni qayta yubormaymiz. ❌ Qaytarib berish yo‘q, istisnolar yo‘q. 🔐 Uni xavfsiz joyga saqlab qo‘ying!
uz.smm_intro: 📢📊 SMM Xizmatlarimizga Xush Kelibsiz! 🚀 🚀 Onlayn ishtirokingizni bizning Social Media Marketing (SMM) xizmatlarimiz bilan kuchaytiring. 🔥 Foydalanuvchilar bilan faollikni oshirish 📈 Obunachilar sonini ko‘paytirish 💸 Ko‘proq savdo qilish 🎯 Bizning maxsus paketlarimizdan birini tanlab, o‘sishni boshlang!
uz.payment_question: 💰✨ To‘lov usulini tanlang ✨💰 💳 Xavfsiz va tezkor tranzaksiyalar! 🔹 💳 Click – Kartangiz bilan tezkor to‘lov. 🔹 💳 PayMe – Oson va ishonchli mobil to‘lov. 🛍️ O‘zingizga qulay usulni tanlang va premium xususiyatlardan bahramand bo‘ling!
uz.wrong_command: ❌🤖 Oops! Noto‘g‘ri buyruq kiritildi. 🔄 Iltimos, qaytadan urinib ko‘ring yoki yordam uchun /start ni bosing.
